remarks: The division ring on trace-preserving endomorphisms for a fiducial co-atom ` W ` .  (Contributed by NM, 5-Jun-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
erngset.h-r $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
erngset.t-r $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
erngset.e-r $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
erngset.d-r $e |- D = ( ( EDRingR ` K ) ` W ) $.
erngset-rN $p |- ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) -> D = { <. ( Base ` ndx ) , E >. , <. ( +g ` ndx ) , ( s e. E , t e. E |-> ( f e. T |-> ( ( s ` f ) o. ( t ` f ) ) ) ) >. , <. ( .r ` ndx ) , ( s e. E , t e. E |-> ( t o. s ) ) >. } ) $.
$d K f s t $.
$d W f s t $.
